title: Night's Edge
summaries: The Night's Edge is a post-Skeletron broadsword, notable for having the highest base damage of all swords available before entering Hardmode. When swung, the Night's Edge emits fire-like purple particles, similarly to the swords used in crafting it, but the effect is more subtle and does not last as long.

On the <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop version</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console version</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile version</linked>, a purple aura comes off of the Night's Edge when swung, following the swing and increasing the range at which it can hit enemies. The aura also swings around a second time on its own, further increasing range and even covering behind the player. This aura can break <linked>pots</linked> through walls, but cannot damage enemies there. If the blade or its aura strike an enemy, a purple flash is created. The Night's Edge is also capable of <linked>autoswing</linked>.
Once in Hardmode, the Night's Edge can be upgraded into the <linked>True Night's Edge</linked>.
